experience.title: Senior Product Manager
experience.description: Drove product strategy for enterprise SaaS platform serving 500+ Fortune 1000 clients, generating $50M+ annual revenue. Spearheaded go-to-market strategy for 3 major product launches, achieving 150% of adoption targets within first quarter. Led cross-functional team of 15 engineers, designers, and analysts to deliver data-driven product improvements. Established strategic partnerships with 8 major technology vendors, expanding market reach by 200%. Pioneered customer-centric product development process using advanced analytics, increasing NPS from 42 to 78. Transformed product roadmap using quantitative KPIs, resulting in 45% increase in user engagement and 35% boost in revenue.

experience.title: Product Manager
experience.description: Managed product lifecycle for B2B analytics platform used by 200+ enterprise customers. Led market research initiatives identifying $20M revenue opportunity in new vertical. Designed and launched 4 key features resulting in 60% increase in customer retention. Optimized pricing strategy through A/B testing, improving conversion rate by 25%. Collaborated with engineering teams to reduce technical debt by 40% while maintaining feature velocity.

experience.title: Associate Product Manager
experience.description: Developed product requirements and user stories for mobile application with 1M+ downloads. Analyzed user behavior data using SQL and Python, uncovering insights that improved retention by 30%. Coordinated with stakeholders across 5 departments to deliver 8 product releases on schedule. Implemented agile methodologies reducing sprint planning time by 50%.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
